mapper.select: select * from t_guard_work where id=#{id}
select * from t_guard_work where userId=#{userId} AND (isPeriod = 0 OR (isPeriod = 1 AND endTime >= NOW()))

SELECT c.id AS guardId, c.level AS level, c.guardType AS guardType, c.priceType AS priceType, c.image AS image, w.id AS workId, w.guardId AS guardId, w.userId AS userId, w.roomId AS roomId, w.isPeriod AS isPeriod, w.endTime AS endTime FROM t_guard_work w, t_guard_conf c WHERE w.guardId = c.id AND w.userId=#{userId} AND w.roomId=#{roomId} AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR (w.isPeriod = 1 AND w.endTime >= NOW())) ORDER BY level DESC, endTime DESC
select * from t_guard_work where roomId=#{roomId} AND (isPeriod = 0 OR (isPeriod = 1 AND endTime >= NOW()))

SELECT r.guardId AS guardId,r.level AS level,r.image AS image,r.guardType AS guardType,r.priceType AS priceType,r.roomId AS roomId,r.endTime AS endTime FROM ( SELECT w.guardId,c.level,c.image,c.guardType,c.priceType,w.roomId,w.endTime FROM t_guard_work w, t_guard_conf c WHERE w.guardId=c.id AND w.userId= #{userId} AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR (w.isPeriod = 1 AND w.endTime >= NOW())) ORDER BY c.level DESC, w.endTime DESC ) AS r GROUP BY roomId

SELECT r.id AS guardId, r.workId AS workId, r.userId AS gdUserId, r.name AS name, r.image AS image, r.level AS level, r.guardType AS guardType, r.priceType AS priceType, r.sortIndex as sortIndex, r.endTime AS endTime, CASE WHEN ISNULL(r.sortIndex) THEN 999999 ELSE r.sortIndex END useAsSortIndex, userAcc.userLevel FROM (SELECT c.id, w.id AS workId, w.userId, c.name, c.image, c.level, c.guardType, c.priceType, w.sortIndex, w.endTime FROM t_guard_work w LEFT JOIN t_guard_conf c ON w.guardId = c.id WHERE w.roomId = #{roomId} AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR ( w.isPeriod = 1 AND w.endTime >= NOW())) ORDER BY c.level DESC ) r JOIN t_user_account userAcc ON userAcc.userId=r.userId ORDER BY useAsSortIndex asc,r.level DESC ,userAcc.userPoint DESC
SELECT * FROM t_guard_work WHERE userId=#{userId} AND roomId=#{roomId} AND guardId=#{guardId}

SELECT e.nickName as nickname,e.icon as avatar,b.guardType,b.priceType ,b.diamond,b.validate,DATE_FORMAT(a.beginTime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as beginTime FROM t_guard_pay_his a JOIN t_guard_conf b ON a.guardId=b.id JOIN t_user_anchor c ON c.roomId = a.roomId JOIN t_user_info d ON d.userId = c.userId JOIN t_user_info e ON e.userId = a.userId WHERE c.userId=#{anchorUserId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_guard_work( guardId, userId, roomId, isPeriod, endTime ) VALUES ( #{guardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS workId,r.guardId AS guardId,r.level AS level,r.image AS image,r.guardType AS guardType, r.priceType AS priceType,r.roomId AS roomId,r.toUserId AS anchorId,r.beginTime AS beginTime,r.endTime AS endTime, r.validate AS validate,r.remark AS remark FROM ( SELECT w.id,w.guardId,c.level,c.image,c.guardType,c.priceType,w.roomId,d.beginTime,w.endTime,d.remark,d.toUserId,d.validate FROM t_guard_work w INNER JOIN t_guard_conf c ON w.guardId=c.id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_guard_pay_his p GROUP BY p.workId) d ON w.id=d.workId WHERE w.userId=#{userId} AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR (w.isPeriod = 1 AND w.endTime >= NOW())) ORDER BY c.level DESC, w.endTime DESC ) AS r
mapper.update: UPDATE t_guard_work set sortIndex=null where roomId=#{roomId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.roomId FROM t_guard_work a JOIN t_guard_conf b ON a.guardId = b.id AND b.guardType = 2 WHERE (a.isPeriod = 0 OR (a.isPeriod = 1 AND a.endTime >= NOW()))

SELECT a.userId AS anchorId,COUNT(*) AS total FROM t_guard_work w INNER JOIN t_guard_conf f ON f.id = w.guardId INNER JOIN t_user_anchor a ON a.roomId = w.roomId WHERE w.guardId = f.id AND f.guardType =2 AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR (w.isPeriod =1 AND NOW() < w.endTime) ) GROUP BY w.roomId ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT #{size}

SELECT a.userId AS anchorId,COUNT(*) AS total FROM t_guard_work w,t_user_anchor a WHERE w.roomId = a.roomId AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR (w.isPeriod =1 AND NOW() < w.endTime) ) GROUP BY w.roomId ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT #{size}
SELECT w.roomId AS roomId,COUNT(*) AS total FROM t_guard_work w WHERE 1=1 AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR (w.isPeriod =1 AND NOW() < w.endTime) ) GROUP BY w.roomId having total >=10 ORDER BY total ASC

SELECT w.roomId AS roomId,COUNT(*) AS total FROM t_guard_work w INNER JOIN t_guard_conf f ON f.id = w.guardId WHERE 1=1 and w.guardId = f.id AND f.guardType =2 AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR (w.isPeriod =1 AND NOW() < w.endTime) ) GROUP BY w.roomId ORDER BY total ASC
SELECT userId FROM t_guard_work w WHERE 1=1 AND (w.isPeriod = 0 OR (w.isPeriod =1 AND NOW() < w.endTime)) AND roomId = #{roomId} GROUP BY w.userId
select * from t_guard_work where roomId=#{roomId} AND (isPeriod = 0 OR (isPeriod = 1 AND endTime >= NOW())) group by userId

SELECT a.id,userId,sortIndex,endTime FROM t_guard_work a JOIN t_guard_conf b ON a.guardId = b.id where roomid = #{roomId} AND b.guardType = 2 AND sortIndex in (1,2,3,4) AND (a.isPeriod = 0 OR (a.isPeriod = 1 AND a.endTime >= NOW())) order by sortIndex ASC limit 4
